verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician בִּ֭נְגִינוֹת <WH5058> [TBin-gi-noton Neginoth עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon הַשְּׁמִינִ֗ית <WH8067> hash-she-mi-Nit, upon Sheminith מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. of David יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אַל־ <WH408> 'al- Nor בְּאַפְּךָ֥ <WH639> be-'ap-pe-Cha me not in thine anger תוֹכִיחֵ֑נִי <WH3198> to-chi-Che-ni; rebuke וְֽאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- Nor בַּחֲמָתְךָ֥ <WH2534> ba-cha-ma-te-Cha me in thy hot displeasure תְיַסְּרֵֽנִי׃ <WH3256> te-yas-se-Re-ni. neither chasten

חָנֵּ֥נִי <WH2603> chon-ne-ni Have mercy יְהוָה֮ <WH3069> Yah-weh God כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for אֻמְלַ֫ל <WH536> 'um-Lal for I [am] weak אָ֥נִי <WH589> 'A-ni I רְפָאֵ֥נִי <WH7495> re-fa-'E-ni heal יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; God כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for נִבְהֲל֣וּ <WH926> niv-ha-Lu are vexed עֲצָמָֽי׃ <WH6106> 'a-tza-Mai. me for my bones

וְ֭נַפְשִׁי <WH5315> Ve-naf-shi My soul נִבְהֲלָ֣ה <WH926> niv-ha-Lah vexed מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; is also sore; וְאַתְּ ve-'at כוְאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you קיְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh but thou O LORD עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against מָתָֽי׃ <WH4970> ma-Tai. long

שׁוּבָ֣ה <WH7725> shu-Vah Return יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD חַלְּצָ֣ה <WH2502> chal-le-Tzah deliver נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; my soul ה֝וֹשִׁיעֵ֗נִי <WH3467> ho-shi-'E-ni, oh save לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an because חַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH2617> chas-De-cha. me for thy mercies'

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki For אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein there בַּמָּ֣וֶת <WH4194> bam-Ma-vet For in death זִכְרֶ֑ךָ <WH2143> zich-Re-cha; [there is] no remembrance בִּ֝שְׁא֗וֹל <WH7585> bish-'ol, of thee in the grave מִ֣י <WH4310> mi who יֽוֹדֶה־ <WH3034> yo-deh- who shall give thee thanks לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.

יָגַ֤עְתִּי׀ <WH3021> ya-Ga'-ti I am weary בְּֽאַנְחָתִ֗י <WH585> be-'an-cha-Ti, with my groaning אַשְׂחֶ֣ה <WH7811> 'as-Cheh to swim בְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol- Every לַ֭יְלָה <WH3915> Lay-lah all the night מִטָּתִ֑י <WH4296> mit-ta-Ti; make I my bed בְּ֝דִמְעָתִ֗י <WH1832> be-dim-'a-Ti, with my tears עַרְשִׂ֥י <WH6210> 'ar-Si my couch אַמְסֶֽה׃ <WH4529> 'am-Seh. I water

עָֽשְׁשָׁ֣ה <WH6244> 'a-she-Shah is consumed מִכַּ֣עַס <WH3708> mik-Ka-'as because of grief עֵינִ֑י <WH5869> 'ei-Ni; Mine eye עָֽ֝תְקָ֗ה <WH6275> 'a-te-Kah, it waxeth old בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol of all צוֹרְרָֽי׃ <WH6887> tzor-Rai. because of all mine enemies

ס֣וּרוּ <WH5493> Su-ru Depart מִ֭מֶּנִּי <WH4480> Mi-men-ni at כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> Po-'a-lei from me all ye workers אָ֑וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven; of iniquity כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for שָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> sha-Ma' hath heard יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh for the LORD ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice בִּכְיִֽי׃ <WH1065> bich-Yi. of my weeping

שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> sha-Ma' hath heard יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD תְּחִנָּתִ֑י <WH8467> te-chin-na-Ti; my supplication יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD תְּֽפִלָּתִ֥י <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti my prayer יִקָּֽח׃ <WH3947> yik-Kach. will receive

יֵבֹ֤שׁוּ׀ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu be ashamed וְיִבָּהֲל֣וּ <WH926> ve-yib-ba-ha-Lu vexed מְ֭אֹד <WH3966> Me-'od and sore כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All אֹיְבָ֑י <WH341> 'o-ye-Vai; Let all mine enemies יָ֝שֻׁ֗בוּ <WH7725> ya-Shu-vu, let them return יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu [and] be ashamed רָֽגַע׃ <WH7281> Ra-ga'. suddenly
